thread.title: Astreya Appoints Bobby Land Vice President R

author: cnbc.com
title: Astreya Appoints Bobby Land Vice President R
text:
SANTA CLARA, Calif., Feb. 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, Astreya announces the appointment of Bobby Land as Vice President of R&D effective immediately.
Mr. Land is an industry veteran with 20 years' experience and brings an extensive record of innovation and leadership in managed IT services and software. Most recently Mr. Land held the Director of Solutions role at Astreya and was the VP of Product at HireMore, an Astreya portfolio business. Mr. Land's career has spanned across technology services, product management and development with leadership roles at well-known companies including IBM and T Systems.
"We are fortunate to have someone with Bobby's proven track record of innovation in the industry, helping to lead us into this new chapter," said Edwin Miller, Chief Executive Officer of Astreya. "Bobby brings a unique and insightful perspective as we expand our commitment to delivering the industry's most advanced data driven services to our customers."
Miller added, "Our focus is on helping enterprises embrace digital transformation while leveraging Astreya's innovative technology. Transitioning day-to-day IT demands to our highly skilled team of expert has enabled many of the world's most innovative companies to accelerate growth and refocus on strategic initiatives. Bobby will be a key asset in helping us accelerate this strategy."
"It is such an exciting time to be a part of the industry and Astreya is uniquely primed to capitalize on the numerous opportunities that are before us," said Mr. Land. "The integration of technology and service solutions make becoming a part of Astreya's new leadership team a very appealing opportunity."
In his role as Vice President of R&D, Land will focus on Astreya's core solution pillars and oversee Astreya's own internal technology transformation.
ABOUT ASTREYA
Astreya is a premier IT solutions provider offering strategic and tactical services for some of the world's most recognizable and innovative organizations. Astreya was founded in 2001 as a staffing company and value-added re-seller. The company quickly grew to include 24/7 end-user compute support, program management, network management and data center operations. Demand for Astreya's expertise increased, which led the evolution from staffing to Astreya Managed Services and the formation of Astreya Professional Services. Headquartered in the heart of Silicon Valley, Astreya is committed to delivering technology enabled services to fuel digital transformation. Astreya employs over 800 IT professionals in more than 35 countries. For more information, visit the company's website at www.astreya.com . Connect with Astreya on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
